reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: Caribbean - 8th Meeting Caribbean Plant Health Directors Forum

description.narrative: Support the science and practice of food, feed, and fiber production (including forestry, wildlife, fisheries, aquaculture and floriculture) and its relationships to natural resources, processing, marketing, distribution, utilization (including nutrition), and trade.

This award strives to support the science and practice of food, feed, and fiber production (including forestry, wildlife, fisheries, aquaculture and floriculture) and its relationships to natural resources, processing, marketing, distribution, utilization (including nutrition), and trade. In addition, this award APHIS supported the annual meeting of the Caribbean Plant Health Directors (CPHD). A critical goal of the CPHD Forum is to increase communication and the transparent exchange of Plant Health information among Caribbean Countries. One of the means of promoting this exchange is through individual and group interchange of information via the annual CPHD Forum Meeting as the Region does not have a Regional Plant Protection Organization. CPHD's goal is to form a plant health organization comprising all Caribbean countries as well as a series of technical working groups under the annual meeting of the CPHD Forum..
